about_the_game:
Dive into The Variant Void, an arcade-inspired roguelike bullet hell where precision, reflexes, and strategy are your keys to survival. Designed for fans of strategic, fast-paced gameplay, The Variant Void offers randomized challenges, tons of upgrades and endless replayability.

A Dynamic Arcade Experience

In The Variant Void, you’ll face an unyielding storm of bullets and enemies based on your progression, and your choices, ensuring every run feels fresh and challenging. As you progress, unlock abilities that adapts to your chosen powers, upgrade your ship, and apply powerful augmentations to make your build solid. But beware: every choice comes with trade-offs, and survival hinges on balancing risk and reward.

Key Features

  • Arcade-Inspired Combat: Feel the nostalgia of classic arcade shooters paired with modern roguelike mechanics.

  • Endless Replayability: Each run is unique, with randomized waves of enemies, upgrades and augmentations.

  • Powerful Augmentations: Enhance your abilities with major and minor augments, from increased firepower to healing buffs, each with strategic pros and cons.

  • Dynamic Bullet Hell Action: Test your reflexes in an ever-escalating swarm of bullets, projectiles, and enemy patterns.

  • Roguelike Progression: Unlock permanent upgrades with each successful (or failed) run.

  • Pursue Challenges: Want an extra challenge? Look for the achievements.

  • Boss Battles: Face off against formidable foes, each with distinct attack patterns and mechanics.

Are You Ready?

Whether you’re a fan of retro bullethells or a newcomer to the roguelike genre, The Variant Void is designed to challenge and thrill players of all skill levels. Dodge, shoot, and strategize your way through waves of enemies and emerge victorious—or dive back in to try again.

Test your mettle and embrace the chaos. Can you make it to the end of the galaxy?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-12400F
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4060
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

short_description: This roguelike spaceshooter pits waves of enemies against you in your pursuit to reach the end of the galaxy. Improve your ship with permanent upgrades and select temporary upgrades during a run to pursue achievements and and kill bosses.
